data.text: @LGBTFeednSeed Maybe, because, there is a big BATTLEFIELD all over Ukraine, hundreds of wounded people. Imagine having time for testing in this conditions. Jesus ur dummer than I thought.
@LGBTFeednSeed Sir...you are retarded. Go see a psychiatrist. You won't get a fully functional-brain, but maybe there is something there left to be saved.

@TenDominik Why aren't they testing? Covid won't go away just because you're ignoring it. They are not taking it seriously at all. We are all in this together and everyone has to do things we don't like.
@LGBTFeednSeed Maybe because they are not testing in middle of FUCKING WAR u dumbass?
@DocWyattster Covid has killed more than war in Ukraine but keep being ignorant of the wider picture sweetie

@LGBTFeednSeed Yeah, because covid having lesser chance of death than being hit by a bomb or shot by a crook is better. Also what about the doctors who don't bother doing covid checks but now tending to civilians in kyiv, donbass, etc? Ignorant.
